channel.title: [PI] Basic Command Problem [PI] [Will Rep++]
channel.description: Alright, well like many people on this website im abit new to PI coding, and im not aware of any of the if.statements. If anyone could give me an ::infcash code that you can only use 2 times and is used for donors only. I will Rep++ to whoever helps me out. Thanks.

item.title: [PI] Basic Command Problem [PI] [Will Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

I would just create a static int for the name of whatever, and give it a beginner value of 0, and every time someone types the command (Gives you cash, whatever, simple if statement), just add 1 to the value of that static int. This could be stored in the character files.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Basic Command Problem [PI] [Will Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @Evocation Evocation
item.description:
@Evocation wrote:

[quote=“orcashark, post:1, topic:378631”]Alright, well like many people on this website im abit new to PI coding, and im not aware of any of the if.statements.
If anyone could give me an ::infcash code that you can only use 2 times and is used for donors only. I will Rep++ to whoever helps me out. Thanks.[/quote]I think you would need some tokens for it, for the players… for example if you do ::starter you can only do it once per ip. Otherwise idk sorry

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Basic Command Problem [PI] [Will Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

By ::infcash, what do you mean? Get maximum cash in your inventory?
